name: Shoot them All (wmgwgames)
description:
This small game was created to check some in game features on different platforms. Although we originally intended it for in-house use, it is a fun little shooter to play.  Can you remove all the invaders or will they drain your health and beat you to the end? Keep moving and keep shooting to find out.

Problems or questions? Contact us at...  issues@wmgwgames.com

Thank you for your purchase....
